column4: hi all, i have some trouble with my printer. i googled and i got "https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/dapper/+source/cupsys/+bug/57050". so its a known bug which seems to be be "fixed upstream".  how could i get this working in dapper?
get a more recent cups version as source and compile it yourself
wont i drive the system crazy when i start compiling stuff availible from source?
